# flow-helpers

Handy helpers for ETLs and API interfacing.

## APIs & Transformations
* Bing Webmaster Tools
* Firebase
* Google Analytics (Universal Analytics)
* Google BigQuery
* Google Cloud Storage
* Google Drive
* Google Sheets
* Google SearchAds 360
* Impact
* Journera
* Listen360
* ScrapingHub
* Sharepoint

## Data Transfers
* SFTP
* AWS S3
* MSSQL
* Snowflake

## Other
* Time
* Files
